item.title: New Paper: Energy Use for Water in LA
item.description: Title Energy use for urban water management by utilities and households in Los Angeles Authors Erik Porse, Kathryn B Mika, Alvar Escriva-Bou, Eric Fournier, Kelly T Sanders, Edward Spang, Jennifer R Stokes-Draut, Felica Federico, Mark Gold and Stephanie Pincetl Abstract Reducing energy consumption for urban water management may yield economic and environmental benefits. Few studies provide comprehensive assessments of energy needs for urban water sectors that include both utility operations and household use.

item.title: Website Redesign
item.description: An Explanation Periodically I find occasion to revisit the design and hosting architecture of my personal website. The previous version was a slick as goose-shit, single page sort of deal. It was built off of a template that was probably designed for a startup’s website or some creative person’s photo portfolio. I got to thinking about how such a flashy design, while nice, doesn’t really reflect the type of programming work that I do in my day to day life.
